page.title: 02INTERVIEW 2
page.content: Mrs.Cooke is a 34 years old housewife with one child.She works part-time at the Post Office as a counter clerk. Mrs.Cooke does all her main shopping in Barnsley,but shops for some things at Dodworth for example groceries. She enjoys living in Dodworth because of the countryside but she does not like the noise of the traffic outside her house. She has lived in Dodworth for 7 years and likes the community spirit.She thinks that there are many amenities for the old in Dodworth but not enough for the young,all the community would contribute funds to improve amenities. When she came to Dodworth,she was accepted asa a resident,even though she was not born there.All in all she thinks Dodworth is a favourable place to live.
